headline: Singapore’s dtcpay Partners With Mastercard Incorporated (MA) For Seamless Global Money Transfers
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is among the 13 Best Big Name Stocks to Buy Now. On June 19, Singapore’s leading digital payments solutions provider, dtcpay, announced it had partnered with Mastercard Move to facilitate seamless cross-border transactions for its users. Under the strategic collaboration, dtcpay will leverage Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA)’s global money movement capabilities to enhance speed, […]

headline: Visa Inc. (V), Mastercard Merchant Fees Infringe Competition Law, UK Tribunal Rules
summary: Visa Inc. (NYSE:V) is among the Goldman Sachs Stock Portfolio: 10 Large-Cap Stocks To Buy. On Friday, a British tribunal ruled that Visa and Mastercard’s default multilateral interchange fees charged to retailers breach European competition law. The development comes as the latest round of litigation over multilateral interchange fees, which has rumbled on for decades. David […]

headline: Stablecoins are 'redefining what we understand money to be'
summary: Central banks and companies like JPMorgan (JPM) and Mastercard (MA) are exploring stablecoin and digital assets that challenge what people think of as money. Noelle Acheson, author of Crypto is Macro Now and former managing director of research at CoinDesk, joins Market Catalysts to explain how stablecoins—though not always stable—serve as key settlement tools driving crypto liquidity and reshaping payments. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

headline: 2 reasons why Mastercard and Visa shares are underperforming right now
summary: Investing.com -- Visa and Mastercard (NYSE:MA) have fallen about 5% each in the past month, even as the S&P 500 gained roughly 4%, and analysts at Morgan Stanley say two forces are largely to blame for the stumble.
